summary: Implements a high‑level wrapper around the Codestral (Mistral) text‑completion service, offering synchronous and asynchronous generation, streaming output, embedding extraction, and response parsing while validating the runtime environment and translating generic completion parameters into the provider‑specific format.
business_intent: Enable developers to seamlessly integrate Codestral text generation and embedding capabilities into applications through a unified, litellm‑compatible interface that abstracts API details, handles streaming and error management, and supports configurable request parameters.
